variants.HGVS: N.D. (Transcript ID not specified in the text)
variants.Description in input context: Deletion and point (L166P) mutations of DJ-1

Experiment Method.Assay Method: siRNA Knockdown and Cell Viability Assay

Material used.Description: Experiments were conducted using SH-SY5Y and HEK293 cell lines.

Readout description.Variant: N.D. (Transcript ID not specified in the text)
Readout description.Result Description: L166P mutation caused significant decrease in cell viability and reduced DJ-1 protein expression.

Basic positive control.Description: siRNA targeting DJ-1 was used as a positive control for knockdown.

Basic negative control.Description: Scrambled siRNA was used as a negative control.

Threshold for normal readout.Threshold for normal readout: Cell viability > 80% and protein expression > 80% compared to control

Threshold for abnormal readout.Threshold for abnormal readout: Cell viability < 50% and protein expression < 50% compared to control

Material used.Description: Protein expression was analyzed using SH-SY5Y and HEK293 cell lysates.

Readout description.Variant: N.D. (Transcript ID not specified in the text)
Readout description.Result Description: L166P mutation led to reduced DJ-1 protein expression in Western blot analysis.

Basic positive control.Description: Wild-type DJ-1 protein was used as a positive control.

Basic negative control.Description: Lysates from non-transfected cells were used as a negative control.
